Class EnemySpreadsheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.bosifullstack.textAdventure.characterCreation.Character
      • io.github.bosifullstack.textAdventure.characterCreation.EnemySpreadsheet

  • public class EnemySpreadsheet
extends Character
    Creates a enemy spreadsheet to be used on the game

        Creates an enemy
        Parameters:
        name - String - Name of the enemy
        strength - int - Character strength
        dexterity - int - Character dexterity
        constitution - int - Character constitution
        intelligence - int - Character intelligence
        wisdom - int - Character wisdom
        charisma - int - Character charisma
        chanceToDrop - int - Chance to drop an item(use int between 0 and 100)
        item - Item - Item that can be dropped by the enemy
        elementalWeakness - MagicType - Character elemental
